sys_ui_script.description: Set the Requested for to the currently logged in user for new records. Users can change the field value

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Set the Requested for to the currently logged in user for new records. Users can change the field value</description><global>false</global><name>x_58872_needit.Needit Set Request for</name><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  //Check to see if the form is for a new record.  If it is a new record, 
  //set the Requested for value to the currently logged in user.
	
    if(g_form.isNewRecord()){
        g_form.setValue('u_requested_for',g_user.userID);
    }
}]]></script><script_name>Needit Set Request for</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-28 07:44:12</sys_created_on><sys_id>d49eb65c1b23301053ffdc6cdc4bcb6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_58872_needit.Needit Set Request for</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_d49eb65c1b23301053ffdc6cdc4bcb6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-28 07:50:00</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
